dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3638 : To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 1100 Kings Road in Jacksonville, Florida, as the “Rutledge Pearson Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 1100 Kings Road in Jacksonville, Florida, as the Rutledge Pearson Post Office Building.

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 1100 Kings Road in Jacksonville, Florida, shall be known and designated as the Rutledge Pearson Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Rutledge Pearson Post Office Building.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives December 12, 2017.
